item.title: Setting Bitbucket on Windows
item.description: Recently, Bitbucket retired the simple password login via git-https. So we will need a ssh-key on it.

item.title: Blog Memo by Hugo with Typora
item.description: In 2021, the blog is upgraded to Hugo + Typora.

item.title: Host Personal Chatgpt-ish Service on AWS
item.description: AWS Lambda can be used to host a personal ChatGPT service, but it might not be the most suitable service for this use case.

item.title: Build a Simple Search System
item.description: In 2020 Sep. I implemented a simple search system from scrach.
